name: Animal Runner (MadFinn Development Co.)
description:
Animal Runner was a small project I wanted to make! It was created in a youtube video that you can watch here: Watch how I made it

 I have never made a roguelike before and this is my first time. It is different than most but I enjoyed making it nonetheless!

  This game has about 10~ minutes of fun gameplay. It is not super long since I was lacking ideas that could fit in with my schedule but I hope you enjoy it!

Heads up:

Mac and Linux versions have not been tested.  Any and all feedback would be fantastic.

All questions and problems can be reported in the comments. 

Subscribe?

Please subscribe to my channel if you find yourself enjoying this game!

YouTube Website
